actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 (78 Stat. 897), as amended.

summary.text: Amends the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to authorize Federal agencies which collect revenues under the Act to recognize and provide for recreational and other beneficial public uses consistent with the promotion of navigation, flood control, and the generation of electric energy.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 (78 Stat. 897), as amended.
